timeline.bodyText:
I think that you can simplify the code from line 42 - 52 by using the combineLatest operator from rxjs so that you wait for both observeables and then fill in the member variables:
combineLatest(this.activatedRoute.data, this.activatedRoute.parent.data).subscribe([...] => {...})
timeline.author: ivanchimeno

replies.bodyText: Ah, nice. I didn't know about that, added it in ea3340b.
replies.author: FrankeLukas

timeline.bodyText: I think you missed the Codacy warning here :)

replies.bodyText: I did, thanks for the hint. Fixed in 7ba17b6.
